Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) can operate in fuel cell and electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Reversible Operation of Metal Supported Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: This option allows for production of electricity and heat from a green fuel in fuel cell mode and for storage of electricity as gas or use as fuel in electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Reversible Operation of Metal Supported Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Demonstration of reversible SOCs has progressed over the last few years.
Titulo: Reversible Operation of Metal Supported Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Increase of lifetime and reduction of costs are major factors for successful commercialization.
Titulo: Reversible Operation of Metal Supported Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: In metal supported SOCs (MSCs) the thickest layer in the cell, the support layer of a few hundred mu m, uses metal instead of Ni/YSZ cermet as in state-of-the-art (SoA) fuel electrode supported cells, thereby enabling a significant cost reduction.
Titulo: Reversible Operation of Metal Supported Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The present study investigates SoA Ni/YSZ SOCs and MSCs, fabricated by tape casting, lamination, and screen-printing, in reversible operation at 650 degrees C in 50/50 steam/hydrogen.
Titulo: Reversible Operation of Metal Supported Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: In the initial few hundred hours, the degradation rate in electrolysis mode is smaller on a MSC compared to a SoA Ni/YSZ cell, while they are comparable in fuel cell mode.
Titulo: Reversible Operation of Metal Supported Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: According to electrochemical impedance evaluation, the degradation is due to a simultaneous increase of the serial and polarization resistances in the MSC, while it is mainly due to an increase of the polarization resistance in the SoA cell.
Titulo: Reversible Operation of Metal Supported Solid Oxide Cells
